scripts.say:
Eagle Union coastal waters 
	Siren Threat Assessment Rating: 1
Man, wasn't expecting to see this many Sirens 'round here...!
Just a bunch of stragglers. We could zoom by without bothering to mop 'em up...
... is what I'd like to say, but we can't group up with Cleve until we get rid of 'em.
Don't underestimate the enemy. You never know what'll happen when Sirens are involved!
All units, prepare to engage! Don't get cocky!
